title: Our land needs your help
creator_credit: Arthur Barr and Arthur Barr Productions
brief_description: Made to develop an awareness of our environmental problems. Follows a group of young people as they clean a polluted stream, check erosion, plant trees, and collect materials for recycling. Uses a blend of original songs, narration and natural sound.
